products.title: Bark Raiders
products.description: Gameplay flows between the surface ruled by lethal machines, and the vibrant underground society of Speranza.

products.title: Baldur's Gate 3
products.description: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power

products.title: Dota 2
products.description: When it comes to diversity of heroes, abilities, and powerful items, Dota boasts an endless arrayâ€”no two games are the same.

products.title: Hogwarts Legacy
products.description: Now you can take control of the action and be at the center of your own adventure in the wizarding world.

products.title: Starfield
products.description: In the year 2330, humanity has ventured beyond our solar system, settling new planets, and living as a spacefaring people.

products.title: Hades
products.description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.

products.title: Kepper
products.description: joined by a spirited seabird, embark upon a heartening tale of unlikely companionship, and an unexpected journey into realms beyond understanding.

products.title: Kingdom
products.description: In Kingdom, each coin spent can tip the balance between prosperity and decay. Attend to your domain, border to border, or venture into the wild to discover its wonders and its threats.

products.title: Marvel Rivals
products.description: Assemble an all-star Marvel squad, devise countless strategies by combining powers to form unique Team-Up skills and fight in destructible, ever-changing battlefields across the continually evolving Marvel universe!

products.title: Path of Exile 2
products.description: Set years after the original Path of Exile, you will return to the dark world of Wraeclast and seek to end the corruption that is spreading.

products.title: Satisfactory
products.description: Play alone or with friends, explore an alien planet, create multi-story factories, and enter conveyor belt heaven!

products.title: Snow
products.description: Explore a massive mountain, customize your character with clothing and equipment, compete in events to be the best.

products.title: The Cube
products.description: A living world full of memorable characters, diverse biomes, and tons of enemies, including powerful bosses, awaits you.

products.title: Train Wreck
products.description: Where players become train operators delivering cargo across multiple stations while fending off train robbers set in the wildwest.

products.title: Valhem
products.description: Craft powerful weapons, construct longhouses, and slay mighty foes to prove yourself to Odin!

products.title: Vrising
products.description: Awaken as a weakened Vampire after centuries of slumber. Hunt for blood to regain your strength while hiding from the scorching sun to survive.

products.title: WarFrame
products.description: Confront warring factions throughout a sprawling interplanetary system as you follow the guidance of the mysterious Lotus and level up your Warframe.
